description:
See what happens when Harmony needs to "train" her new masseuse in the ways of full service... Bella is nervous, but willing to do anything for the pleasure of her client, and a big tip!

Bella gives Harmony an enema but forgets that the bathroom is out of order too late! She also uses water that is too hot & Harmony needs to turn the tables & show her how it's done right!
title: The New Masseuse: Harmony's Happy Ending
